roleset.name: generally alright

role.descr: thing that is generally average, alright

example.name: arg1
example.text: So i 'm not saying if a 14 year boy was forcibly touched by a woman it would be ok .
example.arg: if a 14 year old boy was forcibly touched by a woman

example.name: args 0, 1
example.text: It is absolutely okay with me if you need to keep some secrets.
example.arg: if you need to keep some secrets

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Sure he was evil to Harry and Ron but he was ok to her most of the time

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, corresponds somewhat to okay-v.01.

example.name: arg1 PRP
example.text: Her renal function was normal and she is ok for surgery from a medical standpoint , but her platelet count should be monitored carefully .

roleset.name: having an average amount of skill at

example.name: both args
example.text: Wreaths- the one thing [0]-1 I am OK at making [*-1].

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on good.02.

roleset.name: moderately beneficial, healthy

example.name: both args
example.text: Ask your doctor if coconut flour is ok for you.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on good.04.
